  • Method Details

    • addAnswer

      public int addAnswer(String answerText, application.Answer answer, application.User user, int questionID)
      Create (propose) a new answer.
      Parameters:
      answerText - The text content of the new answer
      answer - An Answer object containing details
      user - The user who is posting the answer
      questionID - The question to which this answer belongs
      Returns:
      The newly generated answerID

    • getAllAnswers

      public ArrayList<application.Answer> getAllAnswers()
      Generates a list of all answers in database.
      Returns:
      A list of all answers in database

      public void deleteAnswer(int answerID)
      Deletes designated answer from database.
      Parameters:
      answerID - the index in the list of the answer to delete.

    • editAnswer

      public void editAnswer(String modifiedAnswer, int answerID)
      Edit the designated answer
      Parameters:
      modifiedAnswer - the new answer text for the answer being edited
      answerID - the index in the list of the answer being edited
